briefTitle: VIT45 Versus Oral Iron in the Treatment of Anemia in Non-Dialysis Dependent Chronic Kidney Disease
officialTitle: Comparison of Safety & Efficacy of a Unique Intravenous Iron (VIT45) Preparation vs Oral Iron in the Treatment of Anemia in Non-Dialysis Dependent Chronic Kidney Disease
summary: This study compares the efficacy and safety of intravenous (IV) iron (VIT45) versus oral iron (ferrous sulfate) administered to subjects who suffer from anemia and are diagnosed with non-dialysis dependent chronic kidney disease (NDD-CKD).
